Package net.kyori.adventure.bossbar

Interface BossBar

All Superinterfaces:
net.kyori.examination.Examinable
@NonExtendable public interface BossBar extends net.kyori.examination.Examinable
Represents an in-game bossbar which can be shown to the client.

A bossbar consists of:

name
the title of the bossbar
progress
a number in the range [0,1] representing how much of the bossbar should be filled
color
the BossBar.Color of the bossbar; platforms may downsample this for versions below Java Edition 1.9
overlay
BossBar.Overlays decide if the bossbar is continuous or split into segments
flags(optional)
BossBar.Flags are extra actions that can be triggered whenever the bossbar is displayed
Since:
4.0.0

    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    BossBar.Color
    One of the colors the bar component of a BossBar.
    static enum 
    BossBar.Flag
    Flags to control toggleable effects of a bossbar.
    static interface 
    BossBar.Listener
    A listener for changes that happen on a BossBar.
    static enum 
    BossBar.Overlay
    An overlay on the bar component of a bossbar.
